title: Pietro Ferrari (footballer, born 1906)
text:
Pietro Ferrari (; April 6, 1906 – ?) was an <a href="Italians">Italian</a> professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
He played for 3 seasons (27 games, 3 goals) in the <a href="Serie%20A">Serie A</a> for <a href="A.S.%20Roma">A.S. Roma</a> and <a href="A.S.%20Casale%20Calcio">A.S. Casale Calcio</a>.
